title: Update Seller on Market Activity
description: A listing has been on the market for 30 days. The agent needs to provide the seller with a market activity update.

tasks.description: Gather statistics for the listing: online views, number of showings, and any feedback received.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent compiles all relevant activity data for the property.

tasks.description: Research any new comparable listings or sales in the area since the property was listed.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds new market data that might affect the listing.

tasks.description: Generate a report summarizing the activity and new market data, and recommend a strategy, such as a price reduction.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a comprehensive report and provides a data-driven recommendation.
